Functions
tp_init_mintemp
void tp_init_mintemp (
int8_t value,
tp_feature_t heater
)

Set min temp limit for the given heater(s). Only available for head heaters; not for the bed heater.

Parameters
value
int8_t

min temp value in Â°C to set for the given heater(s). Valid values go from -127 to +127

heater
tp_feature_t

the heater for which to set min temp, can be a bitmask of tp_features

heater_0_init_maxtemp
Parameters
value

Max temp value (from 0 to 65535)
